channel.title: Wtf
channel.description:
i was adding a npc in autospawn and i got this error...
Devolution Server 4.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool ------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Numb rFormatException: For input string: "2 2601 3104 0 0 0 0 0 1 25 A Man" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1329) at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:60)

item.title: Wtf
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Use tabs rather than spaces.
